name: Seconds 2 Live
description:
Seconds 2 live is a 2D platform where you help the victim  of a space crash and his sidekick ostrich collect parts to repair their ship. Be careful due to the different atmosphere you can only survive for two seconds before you need to repressurise your suit. 

All art, music and game mechanics made in 48 hours with the exception of the font which was purchased from the Unity Asset Store

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/fonts/pixel-fonts-megapack-65958
